properties.Name: EmployeeEmployment
properties.Description: The Employment held by the Employee during the associated period.

Columns.Name: EmployeeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Employee.

Columns.Name: EmployerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Employer.

Columns.Name: JobTitleId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Job Title.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date of the associated Employment position.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date of the associated Employment position.

Columns.Name: EmploymentPositionTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Employment Position Type.

Columns.Name: AnnualSalaryAmount
Columns.Description: The estimated annual salary of the individual in the position.

Columns.Name: EmploymentNote
Columns.Description: Notes, comments or additional information regarding the associated employment.

Columns.Name: EmploymentClassificationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Employment Classification.

Columns.Name: EmploymentStatusId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Employment Status.
